Precision grooming—anywhere. The Bevel Trimmer SE delivers cordless power, clean lines, and a sleek design built for home or on-the-go.

Why You Love it: 

  • Long-lasting power: 4 hours of rechargeable battery life for uninterrupted sessions.

  • Square Blade included: Tool-less adjustments for perfect line-ups in seconds—face, head, or body.

  • Pro-level performance: Designed with barbers in mind for sharp, salon-quality results.

  • Versatile use: Ideal for beards, mustaches, and precise detailing.

  • On-the-go ready: Sleek, lightweight, and easy to pack for grooming wherever you are.
